channel.title: Hacker
channel.description: How do I get rid of this "pro hacker?" I mean I can't IP him he'll just change the ip. He knows how to hack mod and stuff. How the hell do I shoo hi away. He knows how to get into our computers!!!!

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

How about you don’t let him make you look like a bitch? Come on… It’s not that fucking hard to keep one person off of your server and from doing certain commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @David_Shift David Shift
item.description:
@David_Shift wrote:

Also quick note, if other players do play with that ISP just ban the host for a few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:13, topic:357352”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=453866.msg3324567#msg3324567 date=1283006735]
…I made my own source. I’ve had t up for a month. I don’t have any commands for non-staff people.
[/quote]
You made your own source, and yet don’t know how to fix this “hacker”. Yea, okay then.[/quote]

he didnt make his own source from scratch but his base is delta
and i think delta has added names to it

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

turn your server off for 3 days maybe and work on it
then he’ll lose interest and then quit?

EDIT:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:10, topic:357352”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=453866.msg3324192#msg3324192 date=1282970054]

OMG, LOL!!! Are you guys reading my posts? I made my own server… I have no other names in my server other than mine…

you my friend, are an idiot, not reading directions right.
[/quote]

I Lol’d.
Some commands may be allowed to those of lower ranks and of different usernames. Just check all of your commands and etc. He’s probably bluffing alot and could just be working with people. You never know.
And get into your computers? Not technically possible unless you’ve established a direct connection with this guy (Hamachi normally) and he knows the password to access your computer. He can’t get in basically unless you download something.[/quote]
and this is true he can hack you if you have hamachi and you gave him the password

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:8, topic:357352”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=453866.msg3324170#msg3324170 date=1282967350]
OMG, LOL!!! Are you guys reading my posts? I made my own server… I have no other names in my server other than mine…
[/quote]

you my friend, are an idiot, not reading directions right.[/quote]

I Lol’d.
Some commands may be allowed to those of lower ranks and of different usernames. Just check all of your commands and etc. He’s probably bluffing alot and could just be working with people. You never know.
And get into your computers? Not technically possible unless you’ve established a direct connection with this guy (Hamachi normally) and he knows the password to access your computer. He can’t get in basically unless you download something.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacker
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

sageofmali:

How do I get rid of this “pro hacker?” I mean I can’t IP him he’ll just change the ip. He knows how to hack mod and stuff. How the hell do I shoo hi away. He knows how to get into our computers!!!

He is most likely not hacking your computer, if he is able to use commands and do other things not meant for regular players, it is because your source has names added into it that other people might know about so they can have more access then others. Also they could be using a cheat client.

Read full topic
